The prevention of water-related health risks is based on a system that covers everything from source to distribution.

- Protection of water catchment points

- Water filtration and treatment, physical or chemical

- Distribution network maintenance

- Quality control, on entry into the distribution network and at the point of consumption
- Control of pollution-generating activities: shellfish production areas, etc.

question.title: What is the primary purpose of water filtration and treatment?
question.description: A system that covers everything from source to distribution

option_a.title: To remove impurities from water
option_a.description: A crucial step in preventing water-related health risks

option_b.title: To increase the pH level of water
option_b.description: A common misconception about water treatment

option_c.title: To add minerals to water
option_c.description: A potential benefit of water treatment, but not its primary purpose

option_d.title: To disinfect water
option_d.description: A necessary step in preventing waterborne illnesses
